Carousel Slider

These pictures are all art sculptured and designed by the infamous Spanish architect, Santiago Caltrava

Card Components

The cards main use should be for summary purposes. If more information is needed, it would be better to navigate the user to such page

Heres the basic stylesheet for the card component

        
            
            .card-container {
                display: flex;
                flex-direction: column;
                overflow: hidden;
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 600px;
                padding: .8rem;
                gap: 2rem;
                border-radius: .8rem;
            }

            .card-img {
                width: 100%;
                object-fit: cover;
                border-radius: .8rem;
                aspect-ratio: 16/16;
            }

            .card-content {
                display: flex;
                flex-direction: column;
            }
